issue.title: [CF 643] Persistant "script ran too long" error
issue.body:
r622

Everything seems to work fine, but I keep getting this error. At the bottom is one of the times I've gotten it. As I cycle toons (which may not happen with Pandaria opening up in an hour or two for some time) I'll try to find other examples.

``` 3x TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r622.lua:2771: script ran too long TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r622.lua:2771: in function "LoadOptions" TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen-r622.lua:1963: in function <TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1956> Locals: self = TMW { 0 = <userdata> OnGCD = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2819 Vararg = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:618 SlashCommand = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:5659 modules = <table> {} CancelTimer = <func> @Ace3\..\AceTimer-3.0.lua:311 ReconcileData = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:367 GetBaseUpgrades = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2045 GCDSpell = 5308 DeserializeData = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3109 InNLengthTable = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:453 Group_HasIconData = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1385 InIconSettings = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:499 ProcessedBaseUpgrades = true SetDefaultModulePrototype = <func> @Ace3\..\AceAddon-3.0.lua:425 GetSpellDurations = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:1488 ShutdownProfile = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:1810 DS = <table> {} RegisterEventHandlerData = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:3058 IsEnabled = <func> @Ace3\..\AceAddon-3.0.lua:467 ScheduleTimer = <func> @Ace3\..\AceTimer-3.0.lua:276 Group_Add = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1344 Backupdb = <table> {} RegisterMessage = <func> @Ace3\..\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:118 UnregisterMessage = <func> @Ace3\..\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:181 Update = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2006 EnteredWorld = true SendCommMessage = <func> @Ace3\..\AceComm-3.0.lua:87 Group_Defaults = <table> {} UnregisterAllComm = <func> @Ace3\..\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:202 SetEnabledState = <func> @Ace3\..\AceAddon-3.0.lua:440 CopyWithMetatable = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:1618 ValidateType = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:356 InGroups = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:586 tDeleteItem = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:185 ME = <table> {} AddDropdownSpacer = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:320 InGroupSettings = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:524 Group_ResetPosition = <func> @..\Components\IconModules\IconModule_GroupMover\module.lua:35 UpdateViaCoroutine = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2006 InConditionSettings = <func> @..\Components\Core\..\Conditions.lua:1608 SND = <table> {} TestTex = <unnamed> {} HELP = <table> {} SUG = <table> {} Classes = <table> {} OnInitialize = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:1695 UnregisterAllEvents = <func> @Ace3\..\CallbackHandler-1.0.lua:202 print = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:243 GetUpgradeTable = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:2602 3 = TellMeWhen_Group3 {} deepcopy = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:1632 CompareFuncs = <table> {} TEXT = <table> {} Group_Swap = <func> @..\Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:1355 StringIsInSemicolonList = <func> @..\TellMeWhen.lua:5518 CI = <table> {} Deserialize = <function> define ```
``` ^1^T^SPoint^T ^Sy^F-6739253526162958 ^f-48^Sx ^F-6104356692985915^f-45 ^t^SScale^F8981166384218114 ^f-52^SEnabled ^B^SColumns ^N6^SIcons ^T^N1^T ^SSort^N-1 ^SType^Smeta ^SIcons^T ^N1^STellMeWhen_Group1_Icon3 ^N2^STellMeWhen_Group1_Icon4 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N3^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SDurationMin^N5 ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.15 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SStackMin^N2 ^SDurationAlpha^N0.6 ^SName^SWeakened~`Blows ^SDurationMinEnabled^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^Sthunder~`clap ^SFakeHidden^B ^SUnAlpha^N0.75 ^SShowTimerText^B ^SEnabled^B ^t^N4^T ^SShowTimer^B ^SBuffOrDebuff^SHARMFUL ^SUnit^Starget ^SDurationMin^N5 ^SType^Sbuff ^SAlpha^N0.15 ^SStackMin^N2 ^SDurationAlpha^N0.6 ^SName^SWeakened~`Armor ^SDurationMinEnabled^B ^SShowTimerText^B ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SCustomTex^Ssunder~`armor ^SFakeHidden^B ^SUnAlpha^N0.75 ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SCOMBAT ^t^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^t^t^N60412^S~`~| ^Sgroup^N1 ^^ ```

comments.body:
This error is unavoidable if you try to enter config mode while in combat.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
